activities: NetSource Communications, Inc. owns and operates a datacenter providing  hosting services that include shared, dedicated, colocation, cloud, and managed hosting.  NetSource receives personal  information (from EU and or Switzerland customers) for sales, support, and billing purposes from customers we offer hosting services to.  This information may be collected via visits to our website or by phone, chat, web forms, emails, fax, and written correspondence.  NetSource does not share any of this information with third party companies unless specifically accepted by the individual customer first.  This information is protected in a reasonable manner.  NetSource provides hosting services and does not control or determine the types of data our customers store on their own infrastructure in our datacenter.  In these cases it is the responsibility of our customers for compliance with the data protection priciples of the EU and Switzerland if that is what they choose to do.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
